general.gigTitle: build a modern website using react js and next js as a next js developer

sellerCard.description:
Hello there! My name is Sonjoy, and I am a skilled full-stack developer with over 5+ years of experience in web development. My expertise includes JavaScript, ReactJs, NextJs, Typescript, NodeJS, Express, MongoDB, & prisma. figma to next js.

I specialize in providing high-quality services in frontend & backend development, Mern-stack projects, React js & next js applications, landing pages. I pride myself on writing SEO-friendly and clean code to ensure the best user experience.

if you're looking for a reliable and skilled full-stack developer, look no further. Let's work together!

description.content:
Do you looking at a Landing page, NFT landing page, Figma to react JS, xd to react JS, PSD to react JS, react developer, next JS developer, react landing page, next js landing page, web design, react JS, next js, React js developer, Figma to Next js


Welcome! You've found a web development company that you can rely on. Our team consists of 10+ skilled developers with over 3 years of experience. We use the latest technologies to build websites and have completed successful projects for over 90 clients worldwide.


Are you looking for a sleek, responsive, and modern website built using the latest web technologies? Look no further! As a seasoned Next.js developer with expertise in React.js, I am here to bring your web development ideas to life.


What You'll Get:


Modern Design: I'll create a visually appealing website with a modern and user-friendly design that aligns with your brand and vision.


Responsive: Your website will be fully responsive, ensuring an optimal user experience on all devices, from desktops to mobiles.


Fast Loading: I'll optimize your website for speed and performance, using Next.js for server-side rendering to reduce loading times.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can i see more samples of your work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, of course. Just contact me :)

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do You Provide Free-Copy-Right images And Content ?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes We will provide you demo content And Free-Copy-Rights Images so that you would be able to replace that with your own content in future.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will My website be SEO And USER Friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, The basic structure of your website will be SEO And USER Friendly.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you website responsive?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I am doing website responsive!

steps.title: App Spec
steps.description: I'll write specifications for the app's functionality and features.

steps.title: Design concept
steps.description: I'll design a concept for your website, which we can then develop together.

steps.title: Final design
steps.description: I'll deliver the final design of your website for your approval.

steps.title: Development
steps.description: I'll develop a fully operative website for you.

steps.description: I'll upload your content (ex. text, images, videos, and more) to your website.

steps.title: Requirements
steps.description: We make sure I have everything I need to complete your project successfully.

reviews.comment: Sonjoy was quickly responsive and took care of everything I asked. He was even able to adjust the offer to add features we had not initially discussed, showing he has extensive knowledge. I would work with him again! Thank you, Sonjoy!
Sonjoy did an amazing job with my project. He had very quick response times and was very knowledgable. I would definitely work with him again.

we had a larger project with sonjoy and the work was really good.  Responded within minutes.

Thanks!
Sonjoy did a greate Job! We are totally satisfied and move together on the next one.
Highly recommend, extremely quick turn-around and completed as requested.
